title: Morellonomicon or Grail on Orianna
body: Hi with the recent price increase to morello, is it still more efficient morello or go back to grail on orianna?

replies.body: While now I'm confused about whether to build grail or morellos followed by a nashors on Azir. Opinions?

I mained Ori for a whiiiiile. I like Morellos on *most* champions but on Syndra and Orianna specifically I like Athene's. Since those two spam spells a lot more. But if there is an enrmy Soraka, than by all means. Morellos lol
morello is number one ap item in the game. twin shadows is second

depends on match up

vs chjamps like leblanc I build atehenes for MR if I feel like I can lane easily without getting bursted/other team doesn't have much AD i go morello and tear (if vsing ad mid)

Morello is still more "gold efficient" technically. But if the enemy has 2 AP's, you can't go past an Athenes.

Tear is a bit meh imo. I mean, if your a spammer its fine, but its not necessary if you control yourself LOL
